sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.SYS_IP, A.SYS_PORT, A.SYS_NM, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
binary(A.SYS_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(A.SYS_IP) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(A.MNGR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(B.CODE_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(A.SYS_IP) as cnt FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
binary(A.SYS_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(A.SYS_IP) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(A.MNGR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(B.CODE_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')

SELECT A.SYS_IP, A.SYS_PORT, A.SYS_NM, A.MNGR_NM, A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS, A.CREAT_DT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE A.SYS_IP = #sysIp# AND A.SYS_PORT = #sysPort#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG SET SYS_IP=#sysIp#, SYS_PORT=#sysPort#, SYS_NM=#sysNm#, MNGR_NM=#mngrNm#, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES=#mngrEmailAddr#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE SYS_IP = #oldSysIp# AND SYS_PORT = #oldSysPort#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG WHERE SYS_IP = #sysIp# AND SYS_PORT = #sysPort#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG ( SYS_IP, SYS_PORT, SYS_NM, MNGR_NM, MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #sysIp#, #sysPort#, #sysNm#, #mngrNm#, #mngrEmailAddr#, sysdate(), #frstRegisterId#, sysdate(), #lastUpdusrId# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(SYS_IP) as cnt FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG WHERE SYS_IP = #sysIp# AND SYS_PORT = #sysPort#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG SET MNTRNG_STTUS=#mntrngSttus#, CREAT_DT=#creatDt#, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate(), LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE SYS_IP = #sysIp# AND SYS_PORT = #sysPort#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.SYS_IP, A.SYS_PORT, A.LOG_ID, A.SYS_NM, C.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS, A.CREAT_DT FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG B ON A.SYS_IP = B.SYS_IP AND A.SYS_PORT = B.SYS_PORT LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C ON C.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = C.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
A.CREAT_DT BETWEEN #searchBgnDt# AND #searchEndDt#
binary(A.SYS_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(A.SYS_IP) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(B.MNGR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(C.CODE_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
ORDER BY A.CREAT_DT DESC LIMIT #recordCountPerPage# OFFSET #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(A.SYS_IP) as cnt FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNG B ON A.SYS_IP = B.SYS_IP AND A.SYS_PORT = B.SYS_PORT LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C ON C.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = C.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
A.CREAT_DT BETWEEN #searchBgnDt# AND #searchEndDt#
binary(A.SYS_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(A.SYS_IP) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(B.MNGR_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')
binary(C.CODE_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchWrd#, '%')

SELECT A.SYS_IP, A.SYS_PORT, A.LOG_ID, A.SYS_NM, B.CODE_NM MNTRNG_STTUS, A.LOG_INFO, A.CREAT_DT, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM046' AND A.MNTRNG_STTUS = B.CODE WHERE A.SYS_IP = #sysIp# AND A.SYS_PORT = #sysPort# AND A.LOG_ID = #logId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNNTWRKSVCMNTRNGLOGINFO ( SYS_IP, SYS_PORT, LOG_ID, SYS_NM, MNTRNG_STTUS, LOG_INFO, CREAT_DT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID )VALUES( #sysIp#, #sysPort#, #logId#, #sysNm#, #mntrngSttus#, #logInfo#, #creatDt#, sysdate(), #frstRegisterId#, sysdate(), #lastUpdusrId# )
